website_summaries.verdict: Tone your body and improve flexibility with one of the most versatile workout tools on the market.
pros: This bar is constructed from high-quality steel and is coated in high-intensity padded foam
The result is a comfortable, stable tool to add weight to full-body exercises
Bar is 48 inches long and available in 5-, 8-, 10-, 12-, 15-, 20-, and 25-pound versions
Perfect for physical therapy, aerobics, pilates, yoga, and more
cons: The product ships in a cardboard tube, and some reviewers have noted damage on arrival

customer_reviews.title: BEST FOR HOME EXERCISE
customer_reviews.text: I now have the 15 and 25 lb. bar and will order the 10 lb. shortly. Perfect for small apartment use. Best to watch some You tubes first to set a basic routine. Look for one that is instructional not soft core p... Be careful not to start too heavy as I did. Once you see the you tube routines you will probably realize that for the required reps shown in the better you tubes starting lower is better. Also at 84 this is a great method for older people to do weight training in a private setting.
customer_reviews.author: QDRO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size; good grip and weight
customer_reviews.text: I've been meaning to shorter buy a bar for a while now, for dead lifts, squats, cleans, presses, etc. I wanted a shorter bar as the full-length bar and my family room light fixture had a misunderstanding. I bought two different sizes, 15 lbs. and 20 lbs. Having two bars makes it quick and easy to switch between exercises. I find the bar easier to use than free weights for many exercises. The grip is comfortable and the bar fits under my sofa when not in use. I roll it out, use it, and when done I roll it back under.
customer_reviews.author: AP1980

customer_reviews.title: My side kick when exercising.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this. You want to practice balancing? I use this with most my exercises and it’s also toning my arms without even trying. I have gained so much more balance in the short time I have owned this. I would buy again and again...
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Casper Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: The product it awesome! It’s great for a workout at home. I would give it five stars but it has a cut on it. It comes in a cylinder that opens from the top. So I don’t know How it would get a cut. I am curious if the cut in the bar will get worse when using it and therefore won’t last as long as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Canducci

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I ordered bit not for me. I ordered this for my neighbor who looked at my arms and said. Wow! Yes, it helps gets rids of those flab under the arms if used consistently. It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: John Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one and the 20 lb bar. Both are just great. It’s nice to be able to perform different workouts while holding them. The 30 lb bar did arrive with the shipping tube all torn and a couple scratches on the bars foam but what do you expect? It’s heavy! So this wasn’t really an issue for me. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lex O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mornings on the patio!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!!! Perfect for exercising on the patio in the morning with my coffee..... Great for stretching too. So far after showing it to two daughters and a granddaughter, I have had to order another for each of them. Everybody loves it. In this age of high tech gadgetry the simplicity of this is refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for women !
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine this morning and I have already did a few different exercises thought my day . I got the 12 lbs, at first it seemed heavy but it's actually the perfect weight for me to start with. I been going to the gym early morning and wanted to use my gym time for cardio (hiit) on the treadmill and do my squats and arms at home in order to save 30 min sleep time in the morning. 🏋️‍♀️ I think this bar will work out perfectly. Versatile for floor and standing positions for all parts of body. I am already loving it Much better then holding uncomfortable barbells .
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller living spaces
customer_reviews.text: I received my package quick (thanks to my 2 day shipping). I did not have any issues like others mentioned about torn or mishandled merchandise. It doesn't look it, but it is very sturdy, heavy and the cushion helps a lot. I live in a small apartment so I can't get the longer bulkier equipment. Its small enough to store away easy, but gets the job done. I am very pleased with this weighted bar.
customer_reviews.author: TheMaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered the 20lb bar to start with. I found it too much weight for myself- 44 year old woman just beginning weight training again after many, many years. My husband is loving it though! I just ordered the 8 and 12 lbs bars to begin with and will work my way up to the 20 lbs. Great bar. So many things you can do with it. Very versatile and doesn't take up much space in the home gym (you can put them in a closet, store them under the bed, etc)
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: like too heavy for the deliverer to deliver
customer_reviews.text: I did not give a five star since the bar was damaged. The bar was cut with a box cutter, the weight number fell off from the end of the bar. The bar is scratched on the end of the bar, as if the bar fell off the packag & dragged, like too heavy for the deliverer to deliver. I requested an exchange. Thank God I waited for the second to be delivered, since the 2nd one was more scratched & also the black bar was also cut with box cutter (I'm assuming). I returned the 2nd bar since it was more damaged. Other then this, I love the bar, but I wish I had a nice new one..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I did my first full body workout with this bar and let's just say my body is aching!!! I will be increasing this 10 lb bar to a 20 lb bar in a month. Gotta ease into it lol!!!
customer_reviews.author: #QueenOfRead

customer_reviews.title: No examples of exercises
customer_reviews.text: I love the weighted bar, and the different colored resistance. The only thing I found lacking were the lack of directions or exercise examples
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item missing
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived while I was out of state but my husband was home. The box was damaged and def. appeared it had been retaped closed. The 15 lb. weight is missing. The 10 and 20 lb. weights are just fine. While looking online at a way to remedy this there are really no accurate choices to depict this situation in the Amazon return options. All I want is the missing weight bar. The others are nice and just as advertised. Please help! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Soulmom

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: With the gyms being closed, I was looking for things to help me get a better workout at home and came across this product. The weighted bar seems to be very good quality. It is comfortable to grasp, weighted evenly across the bar, and is big enough to do the exercises I want yet small enough to store out of sight and out of the way. The resistant bands add to the workout, and are easy to put on and off, though they are not individually labelled (that I could see) to know which color is how many pounds resistant. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin V.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful what you ask for! A good thing!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this weighted exercise bar, I definitely did not realize what 30 pounds of steel actually felt like. Ego, if involved needs to be left not at the door but behind the door. Since this is my first weighted bar, I have definitely ventured far beyond my starting point. I am not going to return it. Instead, I've got something to shoot towards. In the meantime, the seller lucks up because I need a weighted bar that I can use right now. So I will be purchasing a 15 pounder to begin. I'm 6'4" 210 lbs. I'm in decent shape but nowhere near 30 pound weight bar shape. LOL
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a faithful Body Pumper until March. I can't imagine going in to the gym anytime soon so I started a home gym. I have used weighted bars in the past but forgot about them; I just couldn't find a weight bar set anywhere local or at a decent price. These popped up in my search and they are perfect! I'm hoping as I get back in to shape that I can use 2 bars together; they might be too thick to use two but the heavy set is perfect for BP and was worth waiting for (about two weeks on backorder). Highly reco.
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home use! I don’t feel comfortable working out at the gym just yet, so I thought I should get my own bar to use in the comfort of my own home... definitely seeing progress in my glutes area
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this weighted bar! I do Pilates workouts on an at home reformer and this is amazing to use as a pole to help with balance And as a weight for arm work. The bar itself is padded which makes it super comfortable. I love how it is a bit wider at the ends which help when using it for balance. I got the 8 pounds and it is perfect for my needs. I am so excited about this pole!! Plus the price was perfect! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: JTHB

customer_reviews.title: Damaged merchandise
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with ripped packing resulting in damaged foam covering the bar leaving a tear in the rubber. The plastic ends looked like it’s been dragged on both ends. Will have to use as is. Buyers beware of damaged product. I have read reviews about the same thing happening to other people. I took the chance and of coarse I also received damaged product. Consumer needs to pack it better to prevent damage.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Linnick

customer_reviews.title: Good addtion to home workout during lockdown
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 8lb bar with the resistance bands (yellow = 10 lbs, green = 15 lbs, red = 20 lbs, blue = 25 lbs, black = 30 lbs). It has been great to use the added resistance when doing squats and arm curls. However, i am not sure if the resistance bands with the weighted bar total the lbs listed or if it adds the extra weight. (8lb bar + 10lb band + 18lbs OR is it 10 lbs total??). I do wish it would have come with an exercise guide of all the workouts you can do using the band/bar.
customer_reviews.author: MommyDearest

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I like to do the FIRM videos and they call for a "sculpting stick" for some of the exercises and this is perfect for that. Also when I do step ups on a high box (the fanny lifter) or dips from the high box or lunges I use the stick for balance as I am 78 and not as steady as I used to be. It's really lightweight (5 #) for a weight but its good across your shoulders for some exercises to help your form. It came nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Swan Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 8, 12, and 20 lb bars for our home gym. The 20 is still on backorder and the other 2 arrived today. These are fantastic! I followed along with a weighted bar workout on YouTube, and I can definitely see that this is versatile enough to keep me interested and working hard for a long time. The bars are very well-made and comfortable to hold. They arrived packaged well without damage. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JRG

customer_reviews.title: None slippery
customer_reviews.text: I love it! No more weight disks. This is perfect for me. Anyone whose not sure how many ways you can use this all you need to do is go on YouTube. Wow! The many workout you can perform with this bar. So satisfied 2 thumbs up! Thank you:)
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Durable but had 3 cuts on the foam part
customer_reviews.text: I just received my weighted body bar, it seems durable , but it came with 3 cuts 1 in the middle of the foam bar and 2 others 10 1/2” from one end and another cut 11 1/2” cut from the other end and opposite side, seems like maybe when they are making it they must lean it on a sharp edge, I’m not gonna send back just don’t want the hassle ( it weights 20 lbs) so I’m just gonna put electrical tape on the cuts to prevent any further tearing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived today and clips on bands are corroded
customer_reviews.text: I received my 5# bar with 5 bands today. The good and the bad: GOOD: * Packaging was excellent - no issues with bar being nicked or damaged. * bar has a nice feel, comfortable to grip BAD: * clips on 4 of the 5 bands are corroded, straight out of the packaging/box. * no coding on bands (or anywhere in the package) to reflect which is the 10 pound band vs the 30 pound band Overall I worry that the band clips will snap. I might try to find better clips. For the price, you’re basically paying for the bar and the bands are a freebie, therefore I’ll keep the set because the bar is very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Telish

customer_reviews.title: Bar None...A Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the 20-pound bar and it is AWESOME! The bar is loved by me and my future hubby. The bar is coated with a soft, sponge-y material so it is easy to grip and sweat resistant. It's versatile as it can be used for arm and chest exercises or for weighted squats and lunges. Hopefully, I will be fit enough in the near future to purchase bars in a heavier weight (Go, Me!)
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Gannon, Work Play & Chardonnay

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of reviews say this shows up damaged. The box it came in was messed up and it was delivered to the wrong address but the bar itself is in perfect condition. With this pandemic it has been so hard to find any sort of fitness equipment. This is a great replacement for a regular barbell or smart bar. I used it for les mills body pump (LMOD) and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: heather mcnally

customer_reviews.title: 15 and 12 lb bodybars
customer_reviews.text: Update: I just got the 12 lb bar which arrived in 9 days and had 2 small gouges on so it wasn't perfect even though the package was pristine. I've added a photo so you can see how much sleeker this brand is compared to another. Photo left to right: 15 - 12 - 10 lb bars So happy to receive this 15 lb bar for home workouts during pandemic. In good condition with no damage (worried after reading some reviews). Delivered in 9 days. I prefer this brand over another brand's, which despite being 10 lb was bulkier due to being more padded and longer.
customer_reviews.author: Slayr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the home
customer_reviews.text: This weight bar is the perfect size for the home. I use it for torso-twists for lower back pain prevention. I often can feel my back crack and adjust from using this. Came in a long thin box
customer_reviews.author: J. Sutera

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for my workouts, I have been using this to do some squats and curls. My only regret is that I should have purchased the 25 or 30 lb bar.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Feel the burn
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I've been wanting to buy a weight bar for a while and I'm glad I did. The quality is decent and it has good grip. Other reviews mention the end caps coming off, but mine are on securely.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Y.

customer_reviews.title: Like this body bar
customer_reviews.text: It has good grip, the outside layer is soft and feel nice to hold. There is also plenty of weight variations on the market, 15 pounds is smth in between for a not really sporty woman. Not too light but not to heavy. Just enough.
customer_reviews.author: A. Greissman

customer_reviews.title: Great Weighted Bar!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It’s perfect for his exercise regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Finn

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: it arrived with 1 small indention- nothing that looks like it will be a problem. with that said I do think packing could be a little bit sturdier to accommodate the weight-maybe just a extra sleeve of bubble wrap. Otherwise the weight itself it just what I wanted for my workout and I see no reason why it wont last a very long time. The circumference is good for my hands and the length is excellent for me. I'm 5'8.
customer_reviews.author: yaya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Yes4All product. The 12 lb bar arrived in perfect condition as I was worried based on other reviews. I gave it a try and the padding is comfortable and it’s easy to grip. Will look out for heavier ones once they’re back in stock. Thank you for keeping your prices reasonable! This company will definitely be my go to for at home fitness equipment ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Princess Consuela Banana Hammock

customer_reviews.title: Love this bar!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality weighted bar. The end caps are color coded with the weight stamped on the end. Mine did arrive with a small puncture in the foam although the packaging was in great condition. I use this for any exercise I’d normally grab a barbell for. The padded bar is comfortable to grip and when resting across my shoulders or chest. I love how compact and easy to store it is and I can hardly wait for the 30 pound one to arrive! I’d have ordered the heavier set if it was available.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne K.

customer_reviews.title: Bars and Bands
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 8lb bar with the resistance bands, the package was a little damage in shipping(not company fault) but everything inside was undamage. The bar is nicely padded and the resistance bands are inclosed in fabric. The bands range in strength I believe starting from 10 to 30 lbs. The bar has hooks to attach the bandsto . Everything seems well made and made to last. Now got to go find some youtube videos to work out to.
customer_reviews.author: SScott

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Have been taking a class for total ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Have been taking a class for total body workout and instructor has it. Great for toning arms and upper body strength.
customer_reviews.author: John Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it should be ok, but it came Damaged with a tear in the foam, probably won’t last as long because that will eventually spread, but good enough for now. Further inspections shows the hooks seem to be weathered, this could possibly be used being sold as new. There are also no markings for the resistance of each band.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Best all-around tool for a good home workout
customer_reviews.text: I ran across these bars at a gym I was at out of town - I had never seen them before and I really liked the way they felt and handled - so I bought one (30 lbs). This workout tool for home use is better than using two handheld weights by far - and there are many more exercises that can be performed. This is an awesome light morning workout on the days between regular workouts. And it just leans up in the corner of your room. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: kssw88

customer_reviews.title: Great home workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this weight bar. It is exactly what I was looking for. The weight is even across the bar and accurate. It really adds a lot to my home exercise while being pretty compact and easy to tuck away. A+
customer_reviews.author: Amd

customer_reviews.title: Weight Bar
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving it a 4-star rating, because its a bit long. But other than that, I love it. I can't wait to use it. I plan on adding to this. With this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great product but terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The bar finally arrived! I've been waiting for one since June! The item is exactly what it is with the exception of the terrible packaging. As soon as I picked it up it fell on my toe... The tube was broken on each side and the bar ends were scratched. I figured it fell out many times during the transportation and delivery. Worth the money! But it.
customer_reviews.author: Yanis Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Durability of bar lining can be fragile if damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok but the bar is is wrapped in a foam padding for comfort and 2 were torn either during packaging or transit. Despite emailing the company in regards to it, I didnt hear back. The rips have gotten bigger at the original tear sites and continue to grow.. eventually the foam will completely tear off. I love not having to swap out plates but dissapointed about the padding for sure
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: weighted bar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 20lb and 30lb bar to use for body pump squat and back exercises at home. The price is fair and arrived packaged well. I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Tears in foam padding upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Shipping packaging was fine but as others have noted, the foam padding on the bar had two significant tears upon arrival. While it does not affect the functionality of the item now, it may over time depending on how you grip the bar. Otherwise, the 30lb. bar is great for a home fitness routine, deadlifts, weighted hip thrusts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Good weighted bar, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: This weighted bar was exactly what I wanted. I needed a bar for squats and this 20 lb bar is perfect for my needs. It’s heavy enough for my workouts and will challenge for a long while. It’s easy to store and well labeled in case I get another bar in the future. It’s far easier to store than a barbell in my small home gym.
customer_reviews.author: L78

customer_reviews.title: Say Yes to Yes4All
customer_reviews.text: This bar is so worth every dollar! It's constructed with an awesome grip, nonroll ends and is a perfect addition to a workout. I will definitely be buying additional bars to add to my home gym. Quality packaging too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for mobility work, specifically with P90X2 Recovery & Mobility. Works great but just a tad too pricey for something that's only 5lb.
customer_reviews.author: Powered by Coffee & Wine

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love the weighted bar, it's perfect for what I wanted it for. I'm disappointed though that it arrived opened and damaged on one end. I understand that it's heavy, but enough people seem to have the same problem, perhaps different, better enforced packaging would work better.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for workouts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when my gym closed in March 2020. It took a few weeks to get here, but well worth the wait. I got the 30 lb. bar and it is versatile for a wide range of weight-lifting exercises. Very well packaged and arrived in perfect shape. Highly recommend for the Stay-at-Home gym.
customer_reviews.author: acapos

customer_reviews.title: Product fine, delivery bent my bar
customer_reviews.text: My bar was delivered with the box bent, and when I opened it and took the bar itself out, it was also bent. As I was looking for a replacement online, I noticed that all the bars (not just this company) were sold out. So now I am utilizing a bent bar (I wouldn’t have minded it the bend was in the middle, but it’s off to one side which makes gripping it very off.
customer_reviews.author: GnoA

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great size and weight. Perfect for light workout. I would have given 5 Stars However, It was delivered to my neighbor's instead of my house. This was obviously the Delivery companies fault. Luckily my neighbor let me know it had come the previous day
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: 15 lbs is a good weight for me
customer_reviews.text: No stores carry this product, so I had to order online. 15 lbs is a good weight for me. Great product and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is a great piece of equipment for a home workout. It is easy to store and is not bulky. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Gray

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good length
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because one of my physical therapy exercises at home has me lifting a broom over my head. It got easier to do so I thought I would add a little weight to it. I definitely do not get through my reps as easily as before. I like the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Noxqqq

customer_reviews.title: Durable and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and durable. The ends are squared off so it does not roll. I gave it 4 stars because I wish it was shorter in length but it still is workable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase enough I will probably buy the other weights. Great cushioned grip and the diameter is just the right size. The width is just the right amount for the distribution of weight to give you a different experience that dumbbells and kettlebells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: That is new and no damage to product
customer_reviews.text: When it arrive in the box it looked fine. Till I took it out to wrap it for my wife gift. I found a cut in the rubber. Since it was a last minute gift I didn’t want to return it. Cut is about 4 in. Sorry but I have to give it a poor rating because of this.
customer_reviews.author: nelson

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my purchase. Sturdy and very comfy because of the rubber foam. Yes there was small imperfections because of shipping but nothing that ruins its purpose. Definitely a must for a home gym. Easy to just put up against a wall or hide under the bed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Babydoll

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great piece of equipment. I wanted to add weight for squats, clean press etc without the haste of weights at home this is perfect. I ordered the 30lb and it doesn’t disappoint. Feels heavier than you would expect! Good foam comfort layering on bar so not additional padding on shoulder is required.
customer_reviews.author: Mac and Carol Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great design - easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: I took a class at the gym that used a weighted bar and had to have one for home. This bar is a little heavier than the one in class, but working out well. I like how it's padded, so it doesn't hurt on my shoulders, etc. It's easy to hold and balance.
customer_reviews.author: P. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this bar at my local gym in my cardio and weight training class and I now use it at home as well I love it
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this and ordered a heavier one. Just don’t expect fast shipping. Took about a week but worth it. It seems pretty sturdy and serves my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Om girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for at home. I bought the 30 lb. I use it for my arms. back, shoulders and for squats. It works just as well as being in the gym only I don’t have to wait for someone to finish using the equipment. I still feel the same soreness as if I was working out in our fitness center. I love it! It fits perfect underneath my bed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Rock ⭐️

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my home workouts and it is well made. I have the 20 lb bar and may order another weight to add to my home gym!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Workout weighted bar
customer_reviews.text: Bar was delivered with the outside padding completely ripped into shreds. Returning for the same item hopefully this one isn’t ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rehab exercises for my injured shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was exactly as described. Perfect for rehab exercises for my injured shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: A simple easy to store workout bar
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. I want more of these now in heavier weight. It's a simple tool to just pick up and workout at home!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my home gym
customer_reviews.text: This review is for a 20lbs weighted bar. I bought this to use along with my Gin Miller's Barbell Blast DVD. It arrived in a great condition and it is perfect for exercising at home. If you're just beginning, start with 10lbs first. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: IGee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar!! Wish I could have gotten my hands on a little heavier one, but it said something about restrictions and they do not deliver that weight and dimension of package to our area....???? Not sure what that means.
customer_reviews.author: kmjalapeno

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy, especially for those who want to improve health and fitness without running the risk of catching covid at the gym. Fast shipping, great packaging, and an overall excellent value! For the price of one month at the gym, you can buy this body workout set. Definitely something to think about. Bottom line, I do recommend. Also, the bar is padded!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lift Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Picked it up on a Lightening Deal. Perfect for getting my squat form in check. Great for lunges as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Workout & Color Chart Would Be Nice
customer_reviews.text: Adding a color chart about the banda and workout tips would be nice. Love the padded bar though.
customer_reviews.author: StokedJourneys

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received the bar on the expected time but was disappointed to see that it had a cut and it looks used.
customer_reviews.author: MCBernice

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This has been getting me through the pandemic as a lifter. I try alternatives like adding bagged weight on the sides for extra intensity, but it has some pretty decent weight to it by itself for a 20lb bar. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denim

customer_reviews.title: Weight bar, 8 lb.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 8 lb. Bar. Hoping to tone up my upper body. Just started with it, Good price, shipped free. Very sturdy, easy on your hands. Can do a lot of different exercises with this bar.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Got the 20# bar
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted one to do some workouts at home and this was just what she was looking for. It’s a solid design and the padding makes it comfortable while the square end caps are a nice touch to stop the bar from rolling.
customer_reviews.author: Xtant3150c

customer_reviews.title: Fitness bar
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was kinda lame, but the item came intact. I really like the padding on the bar it makes it easy to grip and it is comfortable to rest on your neck if you want to do squats. I bought the 12 lb because it had been awhile since I’ve lifted weight and I’m a smaller person, but I would advise going up in weight. After about a week I felt like this bar was too light. The weight distribution is really good and it’s easy to handle but it didn’t feel like enough to get a good workout in.
customer_reviews.author: adfsadfas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store, convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: I like to do Les Mills body pump st home. I ordered two different bar weights. I can stand them in the corner and they don’t take up much room. Easy to quickly grab between the two for my weight amount depending on my exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, nice that it doesn’t roll
customer_reviews.text: Love it, nice that it doesn’t roll. Will purchase more of these if they keep their prices down - it was a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Durable Barbell
customer_reviews.text: This was is my everything. It’s is very durable and it helps with my biceps and triceps exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Loveboo1

customer_reviews.title: Too long and difficult to use in a home setting.
customer_reviews.text: This weighted bar is super long. It’s difficult to use in a home setting. It would be best in an outdoor situation. It is sturdy and a good thickness. The price isn’t too bad. But I had to return mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Feels much heaviler than 10 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Feels heavier than 10 lbs. The upside is I'm getting a good workout on my arms. I'll be summer-ready.
customer_reviews.author: Mssy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than it was posted Packed well Very sturdy and nice cushion added to hold Fairly and honestly priced compared to those who shoot up the price after the Covid Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: K. Oh

customer_reviews.title: Shorter and looked used
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a torn packaging, but I understand , it is a heavy item, but the item itself looked used and the color was like it was in the sun for a while. It was also shorter from the previous weight bar that I bought, different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anahita

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: This is great ! I received and used it today, it really added that extra challenge to my workout so I’m excited to continue to use it and to order the 10 pound bar!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great to lift
customer_reviews.text: I lift this with my arms and now my arms are super muscular. I could be the next person to write a Marvel movie. This bar didn’t come damaged like others did so I’m grateful. The box was not damaged upon arrival. I might want to upgrade the weight if I want to become the next Marvel hero instead of just writing about them.
customer_reviews.author: Yeri

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and perfect for my workouts
customer_reviews.text: I really like my weight bar, I use it at least three times a week for my at home workouts. The only complaint is you can't add weights (which I knew prior to ordering) and the grip is wide and it's hard to do snatches, cleans, overhead squats. Other than that I have loved using this 30lb bar!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my sculpting arsenal
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, no sharp edges, cold metal, and won’t scrape your wood floors. I use it with my waist trainer, stretch bands and exercise ball. Easy to store. Love the material and design. 15 pounds is perfect for me (5’5’, 135 lbs., slim, curvy build).
customer_reviews.author: LdySpade84

customer_reviews.title: It is great, buy one
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with packaging intact. I love it. It is like being in the gym. I am going to look on YouTube for other ways to use it. Right now I am lifting it over my head like those weights in the gym. It is cushioned and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say. It's a weighted bar. But it's well made and is holding up quite well in my home gym. And as far as I'm concerned it's a good value considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Miles T. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I guess the bar itself is fine but supwr long! I'm just upset I got a damaged one!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. lee

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very heavy product and it came through damaged. The center part of the bar is made of foam, and it was already torn when I unboxed it. Also, the ends were blackened which And because it arrived during COVID, returning it has been a hassle because of it's weight and the fact that it has to be brought to UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Montemayor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my usage!! Love how it helps with increasing my flexibility!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for the weighted stretching I am working on. I am trying to work on my flexibility, and using this for lower back, hamstrings, shoulders- amazing really... after 6 weeks almost ready for the heavier one!!!
customer_reviews.author: New Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Came unboxed and damaged
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived with the box falling apart on both sides, so if I didn't hold it carefully, the entire barbell would've fallen out of the box. Each side was extremely dirty, and on one side, the 25lb sign fell off. Not only that, but the barbell had several piercing throughout it. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aiven Song

customer_reviews.title: I love this.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 lb. bar and now a 25 lb. bar. I don't have room for a barbell with plates, these weighted bars are perfect for me and my small workout area. I have dumbbells but these bars are so versatile. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good workout bar
customer_reviews.text: Bar was longer than expected but still liked the feel of it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Christopher Rich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived perfect, sealed in a box and shipped in a larger Amazon box. It's quite heavy for 20lbs. You can tell this is made with high quality materials, unlike the basic ones that I saw in my local fitness stores. I'm ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryanide

product_meta.title: Yes4All Total Body Workout Weighted Bar/Weighted Workout Bar - Great for Physical Therapy, Aerobics and Yoga - Weighted Exercise Bar
feature_bullets: 48-INCH LENGTH HEAVY-DUTY STEEL CORE CONSTRUCTION: Made of solid high-quality steel for added toughness, durability, and stability. Sturdy construction will not bend or break after repeated use
DURABLE HIGH-DENSITY PADDED FOAM SURFACE: Constructed of untearable and breathable padded soft foam surface to increase comfort in use and prevent slipping even with sweaty hands

COLOR-CODED ANTI-ROLL END CAP: Specially designed with TPR plastic anti-roll end cap to prevent rolling or sliding away from your storage corner. The color-coded cap is different for each size for easy identification
LOSE WEIGHT & TONE MUSCLES IN MINUTES: Exercising with Yes4All Weighted Bars help you burn more calories, strengthen arms and legs, increase balance, flexibility and build core stabilization
VERSATILE WORKOUT BAR: Our weighted workout bars can be used during circuit and interval classes, kickboxing and martial arts, weightlifting, aerobics, yoga, Pilates, or physical therapy
